channel.title: I really need help!If not my server is over...=[
channel.description:
When I compile it worked fine but than when I run it i get this: [CODE] - Lmao-Scape - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29)
[/CODE] Where did I edit something? And I would really appreciate it if you helped because if not my server is fucked up the *** and I REALLY need help =\ If you help me and it works you get admin on my server. I really need help I have no idea what I did and my backups had the same thing!!!
